The properties of this ifrs-full:PurchaseOfTreasuryShares fact are: Period :2019-01-01 to 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : RUB Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/213800OMCE8QATH73N15/2020-12-31/ESEF/GB/2/213800OMCE8QATH73N15-2020-12-31.zip/213800OMCE8QATH73N15-2020-12-31/reports/213800OMCE8QATH73N15-2020-12-31-T01.html 33222

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement Consolidates statement of cash flow includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital of 45,940,499,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 5,616,131,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital that should add to 45,940,499,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AdjustmentsForForeignExchangeLossesGainsRelatedToFinancingActivities 138,977,000 + CancelationOfLeaseContracts -41,448,000 + ChangeInExpectedCreditLossesOfAccountsReceivableAndWriteoffsOfAccountsReceivable 19,371,000 + ImpairmentOfAdvancesPaidAndPrepaymentsForConstruction 67,147,000 + ImpairmentOfNonFinancialAssets -2,907,125,000 + AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense 18,540,233,000 - AdjustmentsForGainLossOnDisposalsPropertyPlantAndEquipment 159,897,000 + AdjustmentsForImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossInventories 595,286,000 + AdjustmentsForInterestExpense 9,512,254,000 - AdjustmentsForInterestIncome 609,970,000 + AdjustmentsForSharebasedPayments 463,590,000 - DisposalsIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwill 4,672,000 - ProfitLossBeforeTax 19,997,615,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for Consolidates statement of cash flow. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital Total Value : 45,940,499,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/213800OMCE8QATH73N15/2020-12-31/ESEF/GB/2/213800OMCE8QATH73N15-2020-12-31.zip/213800OMCE8QATH73N15-2020-12-31/reports/213800OMCE8QATH73N15-2020-12-31-T01.html 32984

The sum of these child components is 23,454,599,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. [DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement Consolidates statement of financial position includes an inconsistent calculation. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete.
